page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STEVEN
page.content: I WAKE UP AT 7.30 AM AND I START TO READ MY COMICS IN BED. AT 8.00 MY MUM CALLS ME DOWN FOR BREAKFAST. I HAVE SUGAR PUFFS.AT 8.10 I START GETTING CHANGED FOR SCHOOL. THEN I GO OUT IN THE GARDEN TO PLAY FOOTBALL.AT 8.45 MY MUM CALLS ME IN. I GET MY PACKED LUNCH,FOOTBALL AND COAT.MY DAD TAKES ME TO SCHOOL IN HIS GREEN RENAULT. OUR FIRST LESSON ON A THURSDAY IS TELEVISION.WE WATCH MIDDLE ENGLISH.AFTERWARDS WE TALK AND WRITE ABOUT IT.AFTER A MATHS LESSON IT IS DINNER TIME AND I EAT MY SANDWICHES. THEN I PLAY FOOTBALL WITH MY FRIENDS.IN THE AFTERNOON WE GO SWIMMING. I AM PRACTISING FOR MY BRONZE.THE LAST LESSON IS RELIGIOUS EDUCATION.IN THE EVENING I WATCH TELEVISION AND PLAY SQUASH AT THE LEISURE CENTRE.I GO TO BED AT 9.OO AFTER EATING A POT NOODLE.
